articles.author: Patrick Smith
articles.title: The world's oldest shoes? Sandals found in bat cave are thousands of years old, study finds - NBC News
articles.description: Sandals buried in a bat cave in southern Spain may be the oldest footwear ever discovered in Europe, scientists said.
articles.content:
Sandals buried in a bat cave in southern Spain may be the oldest footwear ever discovered in Europe, scientists said this week, estimating that they could be up to 6,200 years old.
